title: Looking for these Polar Bear back variations
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: Looking for these Polar Bear back variations
posts.post_content:
I've been working on the Polar Bear subset for some time, and am now to the point of needing only commons.

However, I like to strive to always make things difficult for myself, so here it goes...
I'm looking for at least one common with the missing "ie" in "Series", and one common with missing back border.

I've attached a picture of each as an example.

These cards can be literally any common - player doesn't matter - although I do prefer "beater" condition, as these will be going in my binder.

As a sidenote, I'm wondering... Has anyone seen a Polar Bear with a back stamp?
I imagine it wouldn't show up very well, but I'm still interested to see if anyone's got one - even better, one that's available. 

Thanks for reading!
